Someone needs to ban newme2011. I have KAV 2011 legit version, Comodo firewall and AV and Malewarebytes. All that and not a single fucking whistle went off, this torrent is 100% clean and 100% *works, as are all ChattChitto torrents.

-Disconnect from the internet
-Install using CC installer
-Copy Serial, open ASC and go to upgrade then paste and activate.

*If you did try to register while connected, then disconnect, delete the entered serial from the space, re-paste the same serial and activate.(If you don't it will keep saying invalid) Viola!
